website_summaries.verdict: Smaller, cheaper, and more capable, Delphi's new and improved SkyFi2 XM radio is markedly better than its predecessor.
pros: more than 65 commercial-free music channels plus news, sports, and talk channels
cons: The buttons and controls are a little too small
requires separate purchase for car, home, or boombox adapters

customer_reviews.title: Wrong advertising - made in China
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as being made in India. The company says all their products are made in India but it came with a label on it that said its made in China. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description- made in China and not India
customer_reviews.text: This was made in China according to the label. Incorrectly states made in India. The stainless steel is kind of thin and not very thick
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Maillard

customer_reviews.title: Cute functional kadai for family of 4
customer_reviews.text: I gave in to the reviews and bought this. This is a perfect size for a family of 4. I have used it to make Indian curries, fry poori. It’s a good quality steel with copper bottom, sits flat on the stove not wobbly. Temp distribution is even.
customer_reviews.author: VANNE

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Too thin. First time use it left big burn spots on the pan. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely light, set of our smoke alarm everytime we used it
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely light weight. There is no copper bottom it looks like a light coating that has already peeled off completely. Worst thing is anytime we tried to use for deep frying, it set off our smoke alarm. This is due to its overheating and giving a lot of smoke. We have never had this happen before. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My small cute kadhai
customer_reviews.text: Omg..it’s too cute ...must have...great ...price... It took super long to get here...But lovely product...super buy ♥️♥️♥️100% WOW 🤩 If u love kitchen pots n pans u will be in love with this Adorable kadhai♥️♥️♥️Perfect for small portion of food to be cooked in it!
customer_reviews.author: imran shah

customer_reviews.title: So lovely and so fun.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to give to my daughter, who is experimenting with Middle Eastern cooking. It is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: this pot is so handy and light for small portions.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small family
customer_reviews.text: love it!! perfect for frying for small or medium batches
customer_reviews.author: Faiza Carson

customer_reviews.title: Ok to buy
customer_reviews.text: It was the right size I was looking for Indian deep fry . Quality was good and worth for money
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Kadai ever- made of stainless steel and totally worth the money. Heats up fast and very good for deep frying purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Saavi

customer_reviews.title: Thickness and heat transfer.
customer_reviews.text: Does not transfer heat fast even when the stove is at it's highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Rajneesh Kwatra

customer_reviews.title: Smaller in size
customer_reviews.text: Smaller in size then what i expected but good quality
customer_reviews.author: M. Salman

customer_reviews.title: Worth it......
customer_reviews.text: So cute and little kadai... Thick bottom. Worth for price. It is Suitable to cook for 2adults..
customer_reviews.author: Satish amara

customer_reviews.title: Good only for deep frying and serving
customer_reviews.text: It heats up quickly. Not at all good for shallow frying. Food either sticks or burns in the bottom. Only good for serving. The steel is thin.
customer_reviews.author: Saikat Biswas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not worth
customer_reviews.text: The material is very cheap. The food gets stuck to the bottom even when deep frying 😢😢
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I returned these because the bottom of the pan was too thin.
customer_reviews.author: B. Joshi

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Item is very bad quality , just after first use the bottom brass coating faded a lot also the base is so light that it heats very fast and food gets burned within seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Shashank Srivastava

customer_reviews.title: It’s very thin
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for either induction or gas cooking .. it’s too thin even it pops on getting heat...scary as well
customer_reviews.author: Devesh

product_meta.title: IMUSA USA SS w/Copper SA-10100 Stainless Steel Kadhai 7-Inch, Bottom, 9"
product_meta.description: Size:9"If you enjoy Indian cuisine, and serving your table in an authentic way make sure your try the entire line of IMUSA South Asian cookware. The entire line is made in India and will be a great addition to any Indian inspired cuisine. With the collection you can have all the needed tools to make a great dinner for the entire family.
feature_bullets: Made in INDIA of Stainless Steel with Cooper Bottom & Double Side Handles
A Kadhai is a Circular, Deep & Flat Bottom Cooking Pot, Similar to a Wok
Ideal for Shallow and Deep Frying of Meat, Vegetables, Deserts, and Snacks. Also used as a Serving Dish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars45 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
